short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to send images and text to Addie, so she can remember them for you!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Addie works with the Addie Remembers service. You can paste images, text, or links into Addie and she will remember them for you! This service is currently in alpha and not recommended for most users.
